verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto a man <S%G444><s%> that is an householder <S%G3617><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> early in the morning <S%G260%G4404><s%> to hire <S%G3409><s%> labourers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> when he had agreed <S%G4856><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the labourers <S%G2040><s%> for <S%G1537><s%> a penny <S%G1220><s%> a day <S%G2250><s%> , he sent <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> , and saw <S%G1492><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplace <S%G58><s%> ,

And said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G2548><s%> ; Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> is <S%G5600><s%> right <S%G1342><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> . And <S%G1161><s%> they went their way <S%G565><s%> .
Again <S%G3825><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> , and did <S%G4160><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> , and found <S%G2147><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> , Why <S%G5101><s%> stand ye <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> ?

They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> , Because <S%G3754><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> hath hired <S%G3409><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> . He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> , Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> is <S%G5600><s%> right <S%G1342><s%> , that shall ye receive <S%G2983><s%> .

So <S%G1161><s%> when even <S%G3798><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%> , the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> steward <S%G2012><s%> , Call <S%G2564><s%> the labourers <S%G2040><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G591><s%> them <S%G846><s%> their hire <S%G3408><s%> , beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> when they came <S%G2064><s%> that were hired about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> , they received <S%G2983><s%> every man <S%G303><s%> a penny <S%G1220><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> when the first <S%G4413><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> , they supposed <S%G3543><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they should have received <S%G2983><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> they likewise <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> every man <S%G846%G303><s%> a penny <S%G1220><s%> .
And <S%G1161><s%> when they had received <S%G2983><s%> it , they murmured <S%G1111><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the goodman of the house <S%G3617><s%> ,

<S%G3754><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , These <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> have wrought <S%G4160><s%> but one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> , which <S%G3588><s%> have borne <S%G941><s%> the burden <S%G922><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heat <S%G2742><s%> of the day <S%G2250><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> , and said <S%G2036><s%> , Friend <S%G2083><s%> , I do <S%G91><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wrong <S%G91><s%> : didst <S%G4856><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> thou agree <S%G4856><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> for a penny <S%G1220><s%> ?

Take <S%G142><s%> that thine <S%G4674><s%> is , and <S%G2532><s%> go thy way <S%G5217%G1161><s%> : I will <S%G2309><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> unto this <S%G5129><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> , even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> .

<S%G2228><s%> Is it not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> mine own <S%G1699%G1487><s%> ? Is <S%G2076><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ?

So <S%G3779><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> be <S%G1526><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> , but <S%G1161><s%> few <S%G3641><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596%G2398>apart<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>,

Behold <S%G2400><s%> , we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be betrayed <S%G3860><s%> unto the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unto the scribes <S%G1122><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> they shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G2288><s%> ,

And <S%G2532><s%> shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> mock <S%G1702><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to scourge <S%G3146><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to crucify <S%G4717><s%> him : and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%> .

¶ <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee's<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%>, <S%G4352>worshipping<s%> him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>desiring<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3844>thing<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> ? She <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2036>Grant<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> may <S%G2523>sit<s%>, the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G2176>left<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Ye know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye ask <S%G154><s%> . Are ye able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> drink of <S%G4095><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized with <S%G907><s%> ? They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We are <S%G1410>able<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye shall drink <S%G4095><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized with <S%G907><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> left <S%G2176><s%> , is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine <S%G1699><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> it shall be given to them for whom <S%G3739><s%> it is prepared <S%G2090><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were moved with <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4012>against<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Ye know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the princes <S%G758><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> exercise dominion over <S%G2634><s%> them <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> they that are great <S%G3173><s%> exercise authority upon <S%G2715><s%> them <S%G846><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> it shall <S%G2071><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> , let him be <S%G2077><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> ;

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> chief <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> , let him be <S%G2077><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> :

Even as <S%G5618><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to be ministered unto <S%G1247><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> to minister <S%G1247><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for <S%G473><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1607>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho<s%>, a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>by<s%>, cried <S%G2896>out<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2443>because<s%> they should hold their <S%G4623>peace<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> the <S%G3185>more<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stood <S%G2476>still<s%>, and <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> will ye <S%G2309><s%> that I shall do <S%G4160><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> ?
They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> may be <S%G455>opened<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4697>compassion<s%> on them, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> received <S%G308>sight<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
